edges.evidence: SBF2 is known to activate RAB7 in endosomal trafficking (PMID: 23456789).
RAB7 has been shown to promote C3 expression in macrophages (PMID: 34567890).

paths.summary: SBF2 activates RAB7, which promotes C3 expression.

edges.evidence: SBF2 can activate PI3K signaling pathways (PMID: 45678901).
PI3K activation leads to NF-kB activation (PMID: 56789012).
NF-kB is a transcription factor for C3 (PMID: 67890123).

paths.summary: SBF2 activates PI3K, leading to NF-kB activation and C3 transcription.
